metadata.title: USN-6203-1 -- Django vulnerability
metadata.description: Seokchan Yoon discovered that Django incorrectly handled certain regular expressions. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause Django to consume resources, leading to a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6203-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3-django - 2:2.2.12-1ubuntu0.18 python-django-doc - 2:2.2.12-1ubuntu0.18 No subscription required
